concept.title: MME support for flexibility in configuring the S1AP cause codes (Feature f10902-02)
concept.shortdesc: This feature offers the provisioning of S1AP cause codes case by case in the MME for the cause IE in UE Context Release Command and E-RAB Release Command messages. By default, the cause for each case is set to a value indicating the feature is disabled for this case, for example, the MME follows the previous implementation. The provisioned cause codes are provisioned in the new command s1apCauseCodeMappingProfile.

conbody.p: When the old global parameter enableS1apCauseCodeConfig is set to true, the cause codes are mapped from the old s1apCauseCodeCfg command to the new s1apCauseCodeMappingProfile command.
When the old global parameter enableS1apCauseCodeConfig is set to false, the new s1apCauseCodeMappingProfile command is set to default values (disabled).
